attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2005-0132

Date: 2005-02-02

                     Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Marianne Rivoalen, de la ville de Winnipeg dans la province du Manitoba, une avocate, soit nommée juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine du Manitoba (Division de la Famille).


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Marianne Rivoalen, of the City of Winnipeg in the Province of Manitoba, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Judge of Her Majesty's Court of Queen's Bench of Manitoba (Family Division).

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Marianne Rivoalen, of the City of Winnipeg in the Province of Manitoba, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Judge of Her Majesty's Court of Queen's Bench of Manitoba (Family Division).
